text.section: The head of the Administration is the Executive Director.

section.section: The Executive Director shall report directly to the Commission.

Subject to the direction of the Commission and in accordance with other provisions of law, the Executive Director is responsible for:
Carrying out the powers and duties vested by law in the Administration; and
Adopting and carrying out regulations.

text.section: The Executive Director is entitled to the salary provided in the State budget.
